actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The scorpion makes two Claw attacks and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two claws.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) Poison damage.
